name: dmqscoelseq
body: |- wb(wceq(cqs(cdm(ccoels(c0)), ccoels(c0)), c0), wceq(cqs(cuni(c0), ccoels(c0)), c0))

comment: Two ways to express the equality of the domain quotient of the coelements on the class ` A ` with the class ` A ` . (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 26-Sep-2021.)
